Uses of Class
entity.Entity

  • Packages that use Entity 
    Package Description
    entity
    Package for all entities.
    special
    Package for special classes (like Inventory).

      class  Monster 
      class  Player 
      Methods in entity with parameters of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Entity.attack(Entity target)
      Do attack on target Use weapon if inventory include one Normal attack is between 0-3 life point damage Weapon attack is between 0-weapon efficiency life point damage
      static boolean Entity.fight(Entity player, Entity monster)
      Make player fight against monster.
